crafter.desc: Has two crafting grids with persistent inventories
grinder.desc: Grinds ores and other resources for double ore output. Activate by placing a pressure plate on top and jumping on the plate. The higher you jump from, the more it progresses. The better the pressure plate the faster it processes
redstone_clock.desc: Emits a redstone pulse once per second. Disable with a lever or other redstone signal
block_kinetic_generator.desc: When this block is hit by a piston head, it will generate some power. Hit all sides as fast as you can for best results
block_player_plate.desc: Like a normal pressure plate, but will only respond to a player entity
item_electro_magnet.desc: Attacts item entities and xp orbs, requires power. Shift+Right-Click to toggle activation
item_cheap_magnet.desc: Attracts all sorts of things, some dangerous. Shift+Right-Click to toggle activation
item_exchanger.desc: Exchanges blocks in a given area. Shift+Right-Click on a block to set as target and normal Right-Click to swap shown area. Shift-Right-Click on no blocks toggles exchange size
item_trash_bag.desc: Right click to open, will trash items matching what is in the inventory on pickup
item_hefty_bag.desc: Right click to open, will trash items matching what is in the inventory on pickup. Has 18 slots
item_spawner_relocator.desc: Hold right click and release while looking at a spawner to pick it up, hold right click while aiming at a block to place it back down
item_pipette.desc: Holds up to one bucket of fluid, useful for removing fluid amounts less than one bucket. Right click fluid handling tiles to insert and extract fluid
jei_assistedprogression_grinder_place: Place pressure plate on top and jump on top to grind
assistedprogression:minecraft:aqua_infin: -Speeds up how fast you can mine blocks underwater
assistedprogression:minecraft:binding_cu: -Cursed item can not be removed from player
assistedprogression:minecraft:channeling: -Summons a lightning bolt at a targeted mob when enchanted item is thrown (targeted mob must be standing in raining)
assistedprogression:minecraft:depth_stri: -Speeds up how fast you can move underwater
assistedprogression:minecraft:fire_prote: -Reduces damage caused by fire and lava
assistedprogression:minecraft:frost_walk: -Freezes water into ice so that you can walk on it
assistedprogression:minecraft:looting: -Increases amount of loot dropped when mob is killed
assistedprogression:minecraft:loyalty: -Returns your weapon when it is thrown like a spear
assistedprogression:minecraft:lure: -Increases the rate of fish biting your hook
assistedprogression:minecraft:mending: -Uses xp to mend your tools, weapons and armor
assistedprogression:minecraft:multishot: -Shoot 3 arrows at the cost of one. Mutually exclusive with Piercing.
assistedprogression:minecraft:piercing: -Arrows pass through multiple entities. Mutually exclusive with Multishot.
assistedprogression:minecraft:protection: -General protection against attacks, fire, lava, and falling
assistedprogression:minecraft:riptide: -Propels the player forward when enchanted item is thrown while in water or rain
assistedprogression:minecraft:vanishing_: -Cursed item will disappear after player dies
